title: Paranormal Pop Culture - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/25/20
itunes:title: Paranormal Pop Culture - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/25/20
description:
George Noory and TV host Aaron Sagers explore his work as a paranormal researcher who has worked on a number of ghost hunting shows on the Travel Channel, how his beliefs in the paranormal have changed, and why ghost stories are so popular.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
